chooseAction(Table) - Method in class entities.MediumAI
Override of the chooseAction function of a normal player AI decides what to do based on rollCount, diceCount and the combination of cards on the field AI always tries to roll higher than 3 and then choose the color with the least appearances on the field AI rolls as long as no suitable card is found or no more rolls are left
